Address: 1140 S University Ave, Ann Arbor, MI 48104
Description: Casual indoor-outdoor canteen with multiple TVs, daily specials, karaoke & trivia nights.

summary.snippet: "Pretty decent service, pricing and overall atmosphere."
"Fried food, burgers, and some sort of delicious cheesy bread abomination."

most_relevant.description: We went here to watch the U of M MSU football game. The atmosphere was great and the nachos were good. The fishbowl was decent. It was fairly priced for the size but not as strong as I was hoping for. Additionally, I do not recommend the brownie Ice cream sunday (pictured below).

Our server was super friendly and helpful, she did a great job! The food was great specially the pizza bread twist app, Santa Fe salad  we’ll really everyone was happy with their order.
Came after move in bday for a family casual meal and we all loved it.

After a Michigan Baseball game, I went to Good Time Charley's for take out and it was great!  I used to come here all the time when I was a student back in the day.  My food was fresh and delicious!  It was a very nice day so I went down to Gallup Park to eat.  Going to Good Time Charley's was a nice walk down memory lane.  Many thanks to all and I will be back soon!

Stopped in here for a quick bite kinda late most places were closed. Walked in got my hand stamped past that no one wanted to talk to we ended up asking the bar tender and it was seat yourself. Sat down it took a while to get some service but once we did the bar tender was also our waitress. Ended up a decent experience. The stix were absolutely delicious! The fishbowl was so massive we couldn’t finish it.
Solid overall. Nothing spectacular, but decent food and drinks at decent prices, so can't complain. Atmosphere 🌎 is phenomenal!!

Without letting us know they changed their deals so that their advertised happy hour was not going to be occurring. It was only when they got the bill that we realized that the bill was significantly higher than we expected. They also recently decreased the value of their happy hour and have sub par drinks especially for the price. If you have a choice I would recommend another Ann Arbor bar. Their food is average with limited options but satisfactory

I honestly did not like Charlie’s that much. However, our service was amazing! My servers name was Kali and she was awesome. She gave so many recommendations and was so sweet! Otherwise, I really was not satisfied with Charley’s. I did see the manager getting upset with the servers and it made me upset. Looks like their management was intolerable and the food was fine I guess.

Would not recommend. Went at 9:45 on a Friday night. Waitress was very inattentive. We asked for things from our order at least twice after we ordered. We never got one if the items we asked for. Waitress didn't really check in, had to chase her down to get ketchup. Left her a 7% tip (I'm a pretty good tipper generally) and spoke to the manager about why I was leaving a crappy tip. Manager said "sorry", but didn't really seem interested in our beef. Our first and probably last visit. Might be nice place if you're going out with a bunch of friends, you aren't Ina hurry, and don't mind not getting things you ordered. 🤷🏼‍♂️
